name: eSmartUIoT
0:
”Alexa, ask eSmart is the door open or shut?”
”Alexa, ask eSmart how many lights are on?”
”Alexa, tell eSmart it's too bright.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: e. smart
des: The eSmart UIoT Alexa skill allows users to tie eSmart's universal device translation service to Alexa. Users can control their devices under UIoT using Alexa's voice features.
